item.description:
Who doesn't love getting gorgeous fashions at an awesome price? Join Smiling Stiletto Shoe Club for a special party at the Finer Consigner clothing store which features an abundance of clothes, shoes and accessories at great prices. On any given day, one might find: Chanel jackets, Prada skirts,Â  Armani suits, Hermes scarves still in their orange boxes, or luxury bags such as Gucci, Chanel, YSL, and Balenciaga all priced at a fraction of the original cost.

Guests will get to enjoy shopping discounts along with complimentary wine and appetizers. Of course, there will be the famous pink carpet walk-off for the title of Best-in-Shoe (with prizes) and mingling with other shoe and fashion loving ladies.

The store is accessible by public transit and there is street parking available.

Smiling Stiletto Shoe Club is a free social organization for shoe and fashion lovers with 2,800 members in the Boston area. You can visit their website at:

http://www.smilingstiletto.com/#!
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Catherine (see photo) inside the store or call 774 232 0000! I am hosting the event!
item.name: Ladies Night at Finer Consigner, Newton: Wine, Apps and Shopping!
